Life@CodeAstra

Oct 21, 2015

Absolutely loving every minute of this boot camp.. For a guy who was looking for some time to invest on himself in becoming a better programmer, this is a blessing..It was just what I wanted. Knowing your data structures, algorithms is the first and most essential step in becoming a quality developer, no matter whatever technology or language you are working on. Hackerrank, Codility are excellent for this.. To be updated..
